name: FADE (Guard13007)
description:
A simplistic drawing app in a borderless fullscreen window. Everything fades away slowly, so draw quickly!

CONTROLS

  • Click Draw.
  • Right-click (hold) Draw with a white line.
  • Scroll Change the current color.
  • Esc Close.
  • P Take screenshot.
  • O Open screenshots.
  • B Toggle black-n-white mode.
  • C Clear canvas.
